sentences.sContent: You would take things as they came. All you had to do was think a little harder and come up with a new solution.
sentences.sCn: 既来之, 则安之， 你必须多动脑子， 想出个新的解决方法来。

sentences.sContent: I come up with half of my blog post ideas while I am cooking (the other half I get while running) so you can use cooking to come up with new ideas for your life.
sentences.sCn: 当我烹饪时我想出了一半的博客日志（另一半跑步时就想出来了）所以你可以用烹饪为你的生活想出一些好的想法。
